Tooling & Automation.original_summary: Successfully modularized core logic, implemented JSON nesting, and integrated FAISS-RAG for automated summarization.
Tooling & Automation.corrected_summary: Successfully modularized core logic, implemented JSON nesting, and planned to integrate FAISS-RAG for automated summarization and tagging.

AI System Design.original_summary: Established logging standards for RAG training, planned local Ollama pipeline, and designed prompt templates optimized for summarization.
AI System Design.corrected_summary: Established logging standards for RAG training, planned local Ollama pipeline, and designed prompt templates optimized for summarization. Defined optimal size and quality of entries and summaries.

Romantic Development.original_summary: Outlined romantic development strategy with subtle progression guided by Caliphora, identified key romantic scenes for AI visualization.
Romantic Development.corrected_summary: Outlined romantic development strategy with subtle progression guided by Caliphora, conceptualised identification of key romantic scenes for AI visualization based on context awareness.

Visual or Audio Prompt.original_summary: Selected visual models SDXL and MeinaMix, configured local integration, and planned visual tagging schema.
Visual or Audio Prompt.corrected_summary: Configured specialized SD models: DreamShaper XL (balanced narrative visuals), Juggernaut XL (photorealistic detail), MeinaMix V12 (romantic/intimate character visuals), Realistic Vision V6 (lifelike portraits), RevAnimated V2 (anime/stylized visuals), SDXL 1.0 (structured world-building), and V1-5-pruned (rapid prototyping). Integrated via local Stable Diffusion WebUI with optimized visual tagging.

Gameplay Design Insight.original_summary: Conceptualized faction-driven decision trees, turn-based scheming, and narrative-driven gameplay loops.
Gameplay Design Insight.corrected_summary: Outlined detailed gameplay concepts including faction-driven decision trees, strategic turn-based faction scheming, and integrated narrative-driven gameplay loops enhancing player immersion.

Loop Mechanics.original_summary: Defined structured loop mechanics, rules for character memory awareness, and ensured logical consistency.
Loop Mechanics.corrected_summary: Established clear loop mechanics governing Mechid memory recovery, defined precise rules for loop awareness among key characters, and ensured robust narrative consistency across loops.

Faction Dynamics.original_summary: Established political influence tracking, hidden agendas, and factional conflict simulation.
Faction Dynamics.corrected_summary: Designed comprehensive systems for tracking political influence, modeling hidden faction agendas, and dynamically simulating strategic conflicts and alliances.
